subject: Tennis
Swiss Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Nadal defeated Andreas Seppi, 6-1, 6-2, on Saturday to set up a final against Fabio Fognini in the Hamburg Open in Germany.
snippet: The top-seeded Nadal defeated Andreas Seppi, 6-1, 6-2, on Saturday to set up a final against Fabio Fognini in the Hamburg Open in Germany.
